```cs
using System;
                    
public class Program
{
    struct Foo : IDisposable
    {
        public int id;
        
        public void Dispose()
        {
            if (this.id != 0)
            {
                Console.Write("0");
            }
            this.id = 0;
        }
    }
    
    public static void Main()
    {
        var baz = new Foo();
        baz.id = 1;
        
        using (var boo = ((IDisposable)baz))
        {
            Console.Write(((Foo)boo).id);
        }
        Console.Write(baz.id);
    }
}
```

Answer: 101

SharpLab: https://sharplab.io/#v2:
